text:
Is someone else having issues with local development deployment? I’m running the `watch`  command, which usually takes around 10 seconds to upload the changes. But the last two days it’s taking more than a minute.
My network is fine, but it seems like it has to do something with HubSpots servers.
The status says everything is operational, which is true. But it is 10 times slower  (<https://status.HubSpot.com/>)
Same speed also when I run `hs uplad`.

works fine for me
I’ve been working on the theme for the last two days and deployment worked fine
Not having any issues with my current project.
Okay, must be something isolated on my environment then. Thank you both!
